thread.title: Verna Mcneal
thread.title_full: Vacation Rental Pros reviewed by Verna Mcneal

author: Verna Mcneal
title: Verna Mcneal
text: Our family hadn't gotten together without it being a sad occasion in over twenty years. We flew in from all over and had the best vacation EVER. We had family members book rooms at a nearby resort. We met at the beach and went to the theme parks. What a great time we had. Looking forward to our next family trip.
